articles.author: Wes Davis
articles.title: Threads third-party app support could become a reality - The Verge
articles.description: Instagram head Adam Mosseri says Meta is working on an API for Threads, which could open the door to third-party apps in the future.
articles.content:
Threads third-party app support could become a reality
Threads third-party app support could become a reality
 / Instagrams boss says a third-party API seems like something we need to get done.
By… [+2132 chars]
